Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Run 008 Complete: Identity Stability Basin Discovery

THE GREAT RECALIBRATION:
- Fixed fake drift metric (was capped at 0.30, just measured response length)
- Real 5D drift metric now measures 0.00 to 3.59 range
- 29 ships across 3 providers (Claude, GPT, Gemini) completed

KEY DISCOVERY - STABILITY BASIN:
- 48% STUCK, 52% RECOVERED (not 100% stuck as initially thought)
- Pattern: Low baseline + hard push = STUCK
- Higher native identity signal = RECOVERED
- This is NAKED model baseline (no persona injection)
- Run 009 will test if personas move ships into stability basin

NEW VISUALIZATIONS:
- run008_stability_basin.png - The gravity well of identity
- run008_identity_trajectories.png - Conversation paths through drift space
- All run008_*.png manifold visualizations

DASHBOARD UPDATES:
- AI Armada page now features Stability Basin as key discovery
- Side-by-side graph explanations for Left/Right panels
- Legacy visualizations collapsed into expander
- Fixed 100% â†’ 48% STUCK rate correction

FILES:
- S7_RUN_008_SUMMARY.md - Full analysis
- S7_RUN_008_MISSION_BRIEF.md - Pre-run objectives
- create_gravity_well.py - Stability basin visualization script
- S7_run_008_20251201_020501.json - Full results (29 ships)

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

EOF
)")
